mapper.select: select * from member2 where mid!=#{sMid} order by idx desc limit 0,5;
select * from member2 where mid!=#{sMid} order by idx desc,rand() limit 7;
mapper.update: UPDATE member2 m SET m.post=(SELECT COUNT(p.mid) FROM posting2 p WHERE p.mid=m.mid);
UPDATE member2 m SET m.follow=(SELECT COUNT(f.follower) FROM follower2 f WHERE f.followerMid=m.mid);
UPDATE member2 m SET m.follower=(SELECT COUNT(f.followeeMid) FROM follower2 f WHERE f.followeeMid=m.mid);
